title: notocactus

content: I need another loan$1,000 USDTPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $1,100Receiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will send in DMWho can make this deal, please leave your message here first, then we will make agreement and execute it after that.Thanks.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on June 10, 2023, 12:00:09 PMI made the loan repayment. Please confirm it. Thank you shasan.I am confirming that I have received full repayment with interest. Thank you very much for the repayment on time with interest and regular communication. Don't hesitate to let me know if you need any more help at any time, thank you. Also, if you want you can post on my lending thread instead of creating a new topic each time.
